It's on Sheikh Zayed Road which is the main road in Dubai, walking distance to the Mall of the Emirates and the newly built Metro railway system.

Reviews.Title: “average”
Reviews.Author: 081247gm
Reviews.Content: Accomadation was good. Restaurant especially at breakfast was appaling.No planning no organasation. We waited half hour for toast and then we sent it back. Every morning we had to ask for cups , for butter etc. Also had my jacket went missing from the room.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient Hotel for families”
Reviews.Author: AnisaShreef
Reviews.Content: My husband, two small children and I spent 6 nights at this conveniently situated hotel. We were able to walk to the Mall of the Emirates as well as take a taxi to all destinations within a reasonable amount of time and cost. The staff were friendly and efficient. We also appreciated the free access to computers and the internet and while we checked our email the kids were able to play Playstation. If you are spending a few days there the room does not include a microwave but does have a fridge and tea and coffee making fascilities. There is also a small store accross the road where we were able to buy water and drinks till quite late. The Carrefour at the Mall is also open till late most days.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent - Value for Money”
Reviews.Author: akatrap
Reviews.Content: We have booked this hotel for my business trip from 3rd Oct 2010 to 7th Oct 2010. I find it very neat and clean, the service was very efficient. The location also very strategic. All in one its value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel Perfect Location”
Reviews.Author: mickyf63
Reviews.Content: We arrived at Dubia airport at 01:30hrs and got a carrier taxi which was pink and driven by a lady and cost 75 Dirhams. The taxi clock shows 25DS when you get in it and it takes about 25minutes hassle free. On arrival at the hotel we were met by very helpful and friendly staff who made booking in very easy and uncomplicated. We were shown to our room which was exactly as described infact it was a lot larger than described. The room contained everything that was needed for a week's stay and was very comfortable and cleaned everyday to a very high standard. There is a free shuttle bus to the beach which runs twice a day once at 9am and then midday and returns at 3pm or 5pm. The hotel is central to all the major attractions which can be reached quite easily by monorail and then a taxi if required. Be careful of the taxi drivers because they will try and take advantage given the chance and take you the long way. The hotel is the ideal place to stay if you are out exploring Dubia and the staff are very welcoming and friendly. I would definately stay again and would recommend this hotel for price,comfort and location.

Reviews.Title: “Excelent hotel at the great location for a good price”
Reviews.Author: UnitedFA
Reviews.Content: Nice room, great location close to the Mall of the Emirates, Carrefour supermarket, Ski Dubai and Metro station. Getting to the beach takes about 10 minutes by taxi or you can use complimentary hotel shuttle leaving from the hotel at 9am and noon. From the beach shuttle runs at 3pm and 5 pm. Staff is friendly and very helpful. There is free internet access in the lobby and surprisingly skype works there without any problems. There is separate bath tub and shower. The counter space in the bathroom is quite little.When we arrived there were only 2 towels in the bathroom for 3 of us but after I called the housekeeping they brought extra towels in 2 minutes. I haven`t experienced that fast service even in the 5 star hotels. Every time we run into the housekeeping person they asked us if everything was fine and if they can do anything for us. Hotel is very clean and quiet. I stay in different hotels (from 5 to 3 star) about 80-100 nights a year and I can seriously recommend this hotel. The room is very simple but spacious and you can`t expect Sofitel or Pullmann standard for that price. We had a very pleasant stay there. Thank you Suite Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Hotel Close to Mall of Emirates”
Reviews.Author: fema
Reviews.Content: Our 2 nights stay in this hotel was more than pleasant. The room was comfortable and spacious with all you need- there were separate bathroom and toilet, sitting area with sofa, safe, minibar, tea/coffee making kettle, supply of water, enough towels and toiletries, pretty good wardrobes. The street is quiet but taxis always available. There is free internet in the lobby. We appreciated also very much the early check-in without additional fare. The staff was curteous and helpful. And of course the big plus is the location, just a few minutes walk from Mall of Emirates, where one can have a bite, for shopping or just catch the metro. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends or stay again in it.

Reviews.Title: “Value for money, but also nothing too special”
Reviews.Author: Dutchguy_in_India
Reviews.Content: This Hotel is located very close to the Mall of the emirates. It is a bit of a walk to the subway, but we did not mind too much since you have to walk through the mall. The mall offers different places to eat and also a very large supermarket. The breakfast is not included and rather expensive for what you get. We just had some breads and stuff like that in the room,.. something that is very easy possible, since the room has a nice table and some chairs. All together I would say that for a suite hotel the rooms are rather small. The cut of the room is not very good, so therefore makes it smaller than is should be. Some people say that the hotel has a heated pool, but that is really not true. The pool is freezing cold and very small. It does not offer a lot of places to sit. Cabs are always in front of the hotel and the ride to the beach is only 6 to 7 minutes. All together we had a good stay in the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “surprisinly good hotel”
Reviews.Author: ciara25
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel at the last minute for 1 week and we were very happy with our choice.the hotel was very clean,the staff was friendly specially Jennifer in reception,we had a room with 3 bathrooms (in 2 of them there were showers) we found that to be very convinient.the hotel is located only a few steps from the mall.i recommend this hotel and i would stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel but poor location”
Reviews.Author: Aussie_family2010
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel with my family of four on a stopover on the way to Europe. We arrived very tired after an overnight flight. I had booked an extra night so that we could be gauranteed a room when we arrived at 5:30am but the message hadn't been passed on and there was a little confusion because the hotel thought we had been a 'no show' from the previous night. All was resolved quite quickly and we were taken to a clean, cool, ultra-modern room. When we woke up we found the room overlooked the building site next door but there was no building happening, so luckily it was quiet. A room facing the street would probably have provided a better view. The hotel staff were all very friendly and helpful and the buffet breakfasts exceptionally good. The Italian style restaurant food available in the evening was ordinary. My only real complaint was that the hotel was located so far from both the interesting cultural centre of old Dubai around Dubai Creek and the glamorous beach resorts along the coast. The only nearby site of interest was the Mall of the Emirates which was interesting for a visit and to see an indoor ski slope in action, but shopping malls have a certain sameness the world over - even the glamorous ones. The hotel itself was very good though and we all made use of the free internet access in the foyer.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent 6 night stay”
Reviews.Author: philsadon
Reviews.Content: Hotel was great for a 6 night stay, room is more than adequate for 2 adults and one 8 year old child. Location great, 2 mins to mall of emirates and cheap taxi's from right in front of hotel. Small pool on roof top with a seperate toddler pool and life guard who would bring fresh towels and sort out a bed, albeit beds are limited but lets face it, you dont choose this hotel for the pool. Deli is 24hour and within the hotel, restaurant and bar in Ibis next door which is accessed throught the deli. Kids are not allowed in the bar but you can take your drink out of the bar at the chairs around. A pint of lager is about £8, which is roughly what you will pay in most hotels in Dubai.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: mabrun
Reviews.Content: We couldn't picked a better hotell for our stay in Dubai. The reseptionists was very helpful, and the service by the pool was superb. The hotel was clean and the rooms very nice. 2 minute walk to Mall of the Emirates with all its shops and restaurants, 7 minutes to Metro station. The food in the Hotell restaurant was cheap and very tasteful. Don't hesitate.. just go there. I hope I can go back sometime.

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money and location”
Reviews.Author: baecc
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the master suite for 3 nights. There's a queen bed, a sofa bed and a chiase, the room is suitable for 5 person as stated in their website but I think it is most suitable for a family of 2 adults 2 kids max. Likes: *Location - just less than 10 minutes walk to Mall of Emirates *Taxi is always waiting outside of hotel; taxi fare to some popular places : About AED60 to Airport; AED30 to Ibnu Battuta Mall; AED25 to Dubai Mall; AED15 to Wild Wadi; all metered taxi so no worries *Attention to details - good quality body wash and hand wash in every toilet/bathroom - 3 of them (comparing with Ramada Downtown Burj Dubai) *Room service efficient - less than 5 minutes after calling reception, blanket, pillows and bed sheets for sofa bed was up and done! *Storage spaces *Shuttle bus to Jumeirah Beach Park *Free internet access at the trendy looking lobby but while we were there, the printer was off so can't print out our boarding passes Dislike: The view from room, empty construction site! Well, can't help it, after staying at Ramada Downtown Burj Dubai the previous nights, with great views so...nothing major just don't open the curtains. * small pool at the rooftop, no baby pool

HotelInfo.Name: Suite Novotel Mall Of The Emirates
HotelInfo.Address: 2A Street, Dubai 283825, United Arab Emirates
